description: In honor of America's beloved National Bloody Mary Day, our Deep Chip Away Bloody Mary delivers the rich, complex flavors of this classic cocktail in a crispy chip form.

Event: "The Birth of Greek Civilization" | Chip: "Virgin Olive Oil"

Connect it to the flavor:

 "Marking the dawn of Western civilization, today we celebrate the birth of Greece.

Event: "The eleventh of the Twelve Days of Christmas (Western Christianity)" | Chip: "Cranberry"

 "As we celebrate the eleventh day of the festive Twelve Days of Christmas, let these Cranberry chips bring to your table the sweet and tangy essence of holiday cheer.
event_name: The eleventh of the Twelve Days of Christmas. (Western Christianity)
